attributes.action: repudiate the petition asking to "restore the full 65% discount for first-time buyers" of council properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Council housing is (or always was) social housing for people who COULDN'T AFFORD to buy accommodation; since the "Right to Buy" legislation was brought in there have been far fewer houses or flats available for people who NEED them.  Presumably "Right-to-Buy" can't be rescinded but at least it shouldn't be encouraged!  What are young people to do when they leave home, especially if they are in groups classified as vulnerable, if there is no Council accommodation for them?
